properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 5:07AM EST until January 17 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Oswego county.

* WHEN...From 1 AM Thursday to 5 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could
impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as
low as 15 to 20 below zero late Thursday night could result in
hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
properties.instruction:
Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited
visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving.

Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM THURSDAY TO 5 AM EST FRIDAY
